languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс бросает на вас заинтересованный взгляд.{/n} "Удивительная молчаливость, {name}. Могу только догадываться о ее причине".
{n}Heinrix gives you a searching look.{/n} "It is not like you to be so quiet, {name}. I can only guess at the reason."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс бросает на вас заинтересованный взгляд.{/n} "Удивительная молчаливость, {name}. Могу только догадываться о ее причине".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a searching look.{/n} "It is not like you to be so quiet, {name}. I can only guess at the reason."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a searching look.{/n} "It is not like you to be so quiet, {name}. I can only guess at the reason."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a searching look.{/n} "It is not like you to be so quiet, {name}. I can only guess at the reason."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a searching look.{/n} "It is not like you to be so quiet, {name}. I can only guess at the reason."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希探询地看了你一眼。{/n}“你太安静了，{name}，这一点都不像你。至于原因，恐怕我只能猜猜看了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a searching look.{/n} "It is not like you to be so quiet, {name}. I can only guess at the reason."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希探询地看了你一眼。{/n}“你太安静了，{name}，这一点都不像你。至于原因，恐怕我只能猜猜看了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te lanza una mirada inquisitiva.{/n} «No suele guardar silencio en estos casos, {name}. Hace que me pregunte por qué».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a searching look.{/n} "It is not like you to be so quiet, {name}. I can only guess at the reason."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te lanza una mirada inquisitiva.{/n} «No suele guardar silencio en estos casos, {name}. Hace que me pregunte por qué».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは探るような目を向けてくる。{/n}「そんなにも静かなのは、らしくないですね、{name}さん。その理由は推測することしかできませんが」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a searching look.{/n} "It is not like you to be so quiet, {name}. I can only guess at the reason."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは探るような目を向けてくる。{/n}「そんなにも静かなのは、らしくないですね、{name}さん。その理由は推測することしかできませんが」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous scrute attentivement.{/n} « Ce mutisme ne vous ressemble guère, {name}. Je ne peux qu'en imaginer la raison. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a searching look.{/n} "It is not like you to be so quiet, {name}. I can only guess at the reason."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous scrute attentivement.{/n} « Ce mutisme ne vous ressemble guère, {name}. Je ne peux qu'en imaginer la raison. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix wirft dir einen prüfenden Blick zu.{/n} "Sonst seid Ihr nicht so schweigsam, {name}. Den Grund dafür kann ich nur raten."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a searching look.{/n} "It is not like you to be so quiet, {name}. I can only guess at the reason."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix wirft dir einen prüfenden Blick zu.{/n} "Sonst seid Ihr nicht so schweigsam, {name}. Den Grund dafür kann ich nur raten."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix sana irdeleyici bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Bu kadar sessiz olmana alışık değilim {name}. Sebebi konusunda sadece tahmin yürütebilirim."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a searching look.{/n} "It is not like you to be so quiet, {name}. I can only guess at the reason."
